title: Fragments, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed: black, 2 reds, purple, blue.  Yellow applied by brush.
dimensions: A. Warp: 61cm (24in.). Weft: 9.5cm (3 3/4in.) B. 49cm (19 1/4in.) by 1.5cm (5/8 in.)
description: A. Patterned blue ribbon very loosely wound around a stiff flowering branch on a white background. Narrow side borders; a shell on a black background. B. Fine floral line on a black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed: black, 2 reds, purple, blue.  Yellow applied by brush.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-110-a,b.
